properties.description: Note - This pipeline only processes full data files. So the input config table must have the Load_Flag as full, those only will be processed by this pipeline.

ifFalseActivities.name: Copy Full Data to ADLS Gen 2
Copy Full Data to ADLS Gen 2_copy1

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'@{item().Source_table}' as Source,
'@{item().Dest_table}' as Destination,
'@{item().Load_Flag}' as LoadType,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Status,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.rowsCopied}' as rowsCopied,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.usedParallelCopies}' as No_ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.copyDuration}' as copyDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as Source_Type,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as Sink_Type,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Execution_Status,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_Start_Time,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_End_Time,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_queuingDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.timeToFirstByte}' as CopyActivity_timeToFirstByte_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_transferDuration_in_secs

ifTrueActivities.name: Get Last Modified date from config

sqlReaderQuery.value: select Watermark_Value As Watermark_Value from datalake.adfconf where Source_table like '@{item().Source_table}'

dependsOn.activity: Get Last Modified date from config

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM @{item().Source_table}
WHERE
@{item().Watermark_Column} > 
	'@{activity('Get Last Modified date from config').output.value[0].Watermark_Value}'
and
@{item().Watermark_Column} < '@{activity('get_max_modified_date').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkValue}'
select Watermark_Column As watercol from datalake.adfconf where Source_table like '@{item().Source_table}'

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'@{item().Source_table}' as Source,
'@{item().Dest_table}' as Destination,
'@{item().Load_Flag}' as LoadType,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Status,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.rowsCopied}' as rowsCopied,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.usedParallelCopies}' as No_ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.copyDuration}' as copyDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as Source_Type,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as Sink_Type,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Execution_Status,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_Start_Time,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_End_Time,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_queuingDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.timeToFirstByte}' as CopyActivity_timeToFirstByte_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_transferDuration_in_secs

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'@{item().Source_table}' as Source,
'@{item().Dest_table}' as Destination,
'@{item().Load_Flag}' as LoadType,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Status,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.rowsCopied}' as rowsCopied,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.usedParallelCopies}' as No_ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.copyDuration}' as copyDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as Source_Type,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as Sink_Type,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Execution_Status,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_Start_Time,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_End_Time,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_queuingDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.timeToFirstByte}' as CopyActivity_timeToFirstByte_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Full Data_uam').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_transferDuration_in_secs

ifTrueActivities.name: Get Last Modified date from config_uam

sqlReaderQuery.value: select Watermark_Value As Watermark_Value from datalake.adfconf where Source_table like '@{item().Source_table}'

dependsOn.activity: Get Last Modified date from config_uam

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM @{item().Source_table}
WHERE
@{item().Watermark_Column} > 
	'@{activity('Get Last Modified date from config_uam').output.value[0].Watermark_Value}'
and
@{item().Watermark_Column} < '@{activity('get_max_modified_date_uam').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkValue}'

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'@{item().Source_table}' as Source,
'@{item().Dest_table}' as Destination,

'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.rowsCopied}' as rowsCopied,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.usedParallelCopies}' as No_ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.copyDuration}' as copyDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as Source_Type,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as Sink_Type,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Execution_Status,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_Start_Time,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_End_Time,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_queuingDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.timeToFirstByte}' as CopyActivity_timeToFirstByte_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy Source to Datalake_uam').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_transferDuration_in_secs
